articles.title: Sydney broadens Covid lockdown as Delta variant cases sweep city - New Straits Times
articles.description: SYDNEY: Sydney’s usually bustling harbourside restaurants were shuttered and city streets nearly deserted Saturday as a two-week lockdown began across Australia’s largest city to contain a rapidly spreading outbreak of the Delta coronavirus variant.
